Description:
As the Assistant Manager working closely with the Outlet Manager at Park Hyatt Doha, your role is instrumental in creating exceptional dining experiences for our esteemed guests. You'll play a crucial part in overseeing day-to-day operations, leading a team of skilled professionals, and ensuring top-notch service. Your dedicated leadership, keen attention to detail, and commitment to excellence are pivotal for the success of our restaurant.At Park Hyatt Doha, we not only prioritize our guests but also deeply value our employees. We're dedicated to fostering your career growth and providing ample opportunities for you to flourish.Proven experience in restaurant management, in a luxury or fine-dining setting.
Strong leadership and interpersonal skills.
Excellent organizational and time-management abilities.
Familiarity with point-of-sale (POS) systems and restaurant management software.
Exceptional customer service skills and a passion for exceeding guest expectations.
Ability to work flexible hours, including evenings, weekends, and holidays.If you are a dynamic and dedicated individual with a strong background in restaurant management and a commitment to delivering an exceptional dining experience, we encourage you to apply for the Outlet Manager position. Join our team at our hotel and be a part of creating unforgettable moments for our guests.Job Details
